exercises.text: Competitive swimmers must wear goggles to protect your eyes from chlorination in the water and to improve underwater visibility
exercises.question: Find the incorrect pronoun and type the correct one
exercises.explanation: The pronoun 'your' should be 'their' to maintain consistency with 'swimmers'

exercises.text: Pesto, a sauce that originated in northern Italy, is traditionally prepared with basil, garlic, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese and olive oil, but some people also add lemon juice in addition.
exercises.question: Select the word or phrase that is redundant and can be removed without changing the meaning of the text.
exercises.explanation: The phrase 'in addition' is redundant since 'also' is already used to indicate addition.

exercises.text: The cat chased the mouse across the garden
exercises.question: Highlight all the nouns in this sentence

exercises.text: She personally believes in my own personal opinion
exercises.question: Highlight the redundant words in this sentence

pronouns.text: The students finished their homework, but he forgot to submit it to their teacher
pronouns.question: Example: Identifying Incorrect Pronouns
pronouns.explanation: Since we're referring to 'he' (singular), we should use 'his' instead of 'their' in the second instance

redundant-phrase.text: Due to the fact that it was raining outside, we decided to postpone the outdoor event until a later time
redundant-phrase.question: Example: Identifying Redundant Phrases
redundant-phrase.explanation: Phrases like 'Due to the fact that' can be replaced with 'Because', 'outside' is redundant with 'raining', and 'until a later time' can be simplified to 'postpone'

nouns.text: The teacher wrote a lesson on the blackboard
nouns.question: Example: Identifying Nouns
nouns.explanation: The nouns in this sentence are 'teacher', 'lesson', and 'blackboard'

redundant.text: Please RSVP back to confirm your attendance at the event celebration
redundant.question: Example: Identifying Redundant Words
redundant.explanation: RSVP already means to respond, so 'back' is redundant. Similarly, 'event' and 'celebration' are redundant together
